sourcesContent:
<template>
    <v-form class="px-4 mt-3">
        <alert-component :texto-alerta="textoAlerta" :tipo='tipoAlerta' v-if="alerta == true"/>
        <v-text-field
            v-model="RazaoSocial"
            label="RazÃ£o Social"
            prepend-icon="mdi-clock-time-four-outline"
        />
        <v-text-field
            v-model="Cnpj"
            label="Cnpj"
            prepend-icon="mdi-clock-time-four-outline"
        />
        <v-text-field
            v-model="Telefone"
            label="Telefone"
            prepend-icon="mdi-clock-time-four-outline"
        />
        <v-text-field
            v-model="Email"
            label="Email"
            prepend-icon="mdi-clock-time-four-outline"
        />
        <v-row class="px-3 py-7">
            <v-btn
                outlined
                large
                block
                color="green"
                @click="SalvarEmpresa()"
                >
                Confirmar
            </v-btn>
        </v-row>
        <load-component :Ativo="loader"/>
    </v-form>
</template>
<script>

import api from '@/services/api';
import LoadComponent from '../LoadComponent.vue'
import AlertComponent from './AlertComponent.vue';
import GenericMethods from '@/mixins/GenericMethods';

export default {
    components: { LoadComponent, AlertComponent },

    name: 'CadastroEmpresaComponent',

    data: () => ({
        loader: false,
    }),
    mixins: [GenericMethods],
    methods: {
        SalvarEmpresa() {
            debugger
            this.loader = !this.loader;

            api.put('Empresa', {
                Id: 6,
                Nome: this.RazaoSocial,
                CpfCnpj: this.Cnpj,
                Telefone: this.Telefone,
                Email: this.Email,
                EnderecoId: this.EnderecoId,
                ConfiguracoesEmpresaId: this.ConfiguracoesEmpresaId,
                DataCadastro: new Date().toISOString()
            })
            .then(response => {
                this.EnableAlert("Concluido com sucesso.", "success")
            })
            .catch(error => {
                this.EnableAlert(error.message, "error")
            })
            .finally(() => (this.loader = !this.loader))
        }
    },
    props: {
        RazaoSocial: String,
        Cnpj: String,
        Telefone: String,
        Email: String,
        EnderecoId: Number,
        ConfiguracoesEmpresaId: Number
    }
}
</script>
<style>
    
</style>
